thread.section_title: Peaches Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Peaches Boutique | peachesboutique.com | 10 of 79
thread.title: Lauren

author: Lauren
title: Lauren
text: With such a huge selection/store, I was worried that there wouldn't be enough workers for the customers. However, the store was efficient and very organized. The employee assisting me, Mia, was wonderful in helping my find my prom dress! She was always willing to go back and find another dress for me to try on! Wonderful service, and very well thought out process.
